page.title: 12Education in Kingswood area
page.content: There are only two schools actually to be found in the area. One of these is in Lower Kingswood and the other in Chipstead. Both schools are First Schools. Surrey works on a system of{First, Middle and Sacondary education. Children start at First School when they are 5 and transfer to Middle School at 8. The final stage of their statutory education is at Secondary School (Comprehensive) from the age of 12 to 16. Once full time compulsory education ceases at the age of 16 the option may be taken to continue one's education. The various buildings comprising{South East Surrey College offer many professional courses as well as "O" and "A" level courses. There is also provision for{Adult {Education}within close reach in Surrey Schools and Colleges
